name: Familyless
description:
DESCRIPTION

Don't you ever wonder whats was the feeling of a house toward its family ? What would it do for them ? Our game is not a story about a family trying to find a way back to their home but the home itself, trying to find back its beloved family. Better play with a Xbox controller on 1920X1080.

THEME & JAM

 Global Game Jam 2019 -  What home means to you.

TEAM

  • Vincent Di Martino, 
  • Matthieu Vanneufville, 
  • Dylan Dromard, 
  • Samuel Dubois
  • Mortal Combat theme-
  • The trooper - Iron maiden
  • Chop Suey- Systeme of a Down
  • All Stars- Smash Mouth
  • The legend of Zelda Twilight Princess- Nintendo

Requires a controller
